description:
T1: Leylandii tree – Reduce height by 4m, trim and cut back sides by 2 - 3m (garden side only)
Height of tree currently: 8m
Height of tree after reduction: 6m
Spread of tree currently: 8m
Spread of tree after reduction: 6m

Reasons for work:
General tree maintenance
More light
Clearance from building
Maintaining tree in its current setting
Reduce shading to house
Suppressing growth of shrubs

(Rear of House)
T2 & T2a: Holly tree x2 – Trim tight to shape 0.5m
Height of tree currently: 4m
Height of tree after reduction: 3.5m
Spread of tree currently: 3m
Spread of tree after reduction: 2.5m
General tree maintenance
More light
Clearance from building
Maintaining tree in its current setting
Reduce shading to house
Suppressing growth of shrubs

T5: Variegated holly shrub – Reduce height by 1m, trim to shape
Height of tree currently: 4m
Height of tree after reduction: 3.5m
Spread of tree currently: 3m
Spread of tree after reduction: 2.5m
General tree maintenance
More light
Clearance from building
Maintaining tree in its current setting
Reduce shading to house
Suppressing growth of shrubs
decision_conditions: Please confirm the remaining height and width in metres for all trees listed.
